xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 09 May 2014
xwikidoc.content: <BFlavien> has joined #phenotips 10:47 <BFlavien> Hello :) 10:47 <sdumitriu1> Hi BFlavien 10:47 <sdumitriu1> Welcome 10:47 <BFlavien> How are you? 10:47 <BFlavien> Thank you :) 10:47 <BFlavien> Thank you again for accepting my proposal ! 10:47 <sdumitriu1> I'm hungry :( 10:47 <sdumitriu1> You? 10:48 <BFlavien> Iá¸¿ fine, a bit afraid about the Phenotips architecture :P I got some trouble getting into it 10:48 <BFlavien> I'm* (And as you can see, I'm also trying to get familiar with the international ubuntu keyboard aha) 10:49 <sdumitriu1> Yes, the code is kind of scary 10:49 <sdumitriu1> Especially if you also dig into XWiki 10:49 <BFlavien> I did a find -exec grep on my phenotips repository on the string "MS.", and I get some results, but I'm not sure if I should modify all of them (especially the files in the pedigree folder) because it was related to another project? 10:50 <sdumitriu1> Yes, you must modify all 10:50 <BFlavien> I never worked with XWiki, but every JS thing are in XML, I still don't understand how everything work together 10:52 <sdumitriu1> http://phenotips.org/DevGuide/UIX should provide some documentation about that 10:52 <sdumitriu1> Including the links to xwiki.org 10:53 <BFlavien> Oh cool, thanks, the only docs I found was : http://phenotips.org/DeveloperResources/SourceRepository and it was a bit light 10:57 <BFlavien> Here is my grep : http://i.imgur.com/XZhRy46.png 10:57 <BFlavien> I replace everything then? 10:59 <sdumitriu1> Not all 10:59 <sdumitriu1> There are a few .java files that have something different 10:59 <sdumitriu1> LMS. 11:00 <BFlavien> Yes of course, I was just talking about the MS. only, not the other string, sorry about that 11:01 <BFlavien> I will not replace it by command line anyway, I wil do it by hand to read everything and get a bit more into it 11:01 <sdumitriu1> The XML and JS files yes, all of them 11:01 <BFlavien> Ok, thank you ! 11:05 <allasm> has joined #phenotips 12:28 <BFlavien> has quit 12:33 <mcupak> has quit 14:15 <mcupak> has quit
